title: Littleshop
author: Littleshop
content: These are unloaded coins, bought directly from Mike.  I have about 20 available right now.$30 each plus shipping.  I can send these untracked at your risk for $1 or tracked for $5.https://imgur.com/a/XvxVOXw

comments.author: Littleshop
comments.body: I also have raw aluminum (silver color) available as well.  Payable by lightning!

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: got a blue one ?  thank. you =)

comments.author: Littleshop
comments.body: Quote from: rsincognito on March 03, 2024, 10:09:08 PMgot a blue one ?  thank. you =)No.  I only have red and silver.  I honestly didn't even know they came in colors at the time, I ordered them directly from Mike and one lot came in red.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: silver, red, blue, orange, purple and green if I recall.

comments.author: tread93
comments.body: I'll take a red one and silver one if you have

comments.author: Cyrus
comments.body: Interested in one of each as well please.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: would like one of each as well. then I will have the silver/red/blue/orange - still need green and purple then.

comments.author: Box Guy
comments.body: Me too…. One of each please.

comments.author: Littleshop
comments.body: Ok!  Will be sending messages tonight for orders!

comments.author: Amax16
comments.body: I will take 1 red if you have any left.

comments.author: Littleshop
comments.body: I have shipped out all paid orders and hopefully sent a message to everyone who wants one so far.  I have limited number of silver ones left and they are circulated.I have a number of red ones, and I am moving them from the original casascius roll to a sleeve with minimal contact.

comments.author: dozerz
comments.body: i would also like one of each colour please.

comments.author: Littleshop
comments.body: All ordered shipped out.  My red coins remain available in very good condition, being put into baggies right from the original roll.  My silver ones have a few left but the remaining ones have marks, scratches or fingerprints.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: The ones I bought arrived safe and sound - thank you @LittleshopI did screw up and buy a silver one - thought I did not have one - so if anyone needs a silver one or an orange one send me a dm - I have an extra of each.

comments.author: Littleshop
comments.body: Bump.  Still have straight from the roll red ones available.
